resources.string: Tuchat will send you an SMS message to verify your phone number. Carrier charges may apply.
By clicking the "Start using Tuchat" button, you agree to our Privacy policy and Terms of Service
This name will be displayed to other users
Tuchat requires access to your contacts in order to show you contacts that are on Tuchat. Your contacts will be safe with us.
We were unable to automatically verify your phone number. A verification code was sent to you via SMS. Enter the code below.
